item.description:
Join us for a very important Conscious Movie Night.

The Copenhagen Climate Conference is deliberating this week about the fate of our planet. Let's get informed and motivated and start working toward real change and commitment to change our planet!

Please join us for The Age of Stupid, an eye-opening film about a man living in the devastated world of 2055, looking at old film footage from 2008 and asking: why didn't we stop climate change when we had the chance?

This event will provide a way for people to talk about this impactful movie and the serious issue of the survival of our planet. We will discuss how its message affects our lives, our attitudes, our perceptions -- and what we can do to help save our earth!
